column2: as he was knowledgable about the restaurant and the different dishes...but when it came to accomodating certain things
column3: he was no less than resilient. As my friend has certain food sensitivities (celiac and lactose intolerant) we asked if a dish could be made without rice or just a slightly modified (we would have paid extra). The waiter immediately turned our question down and went into a lecture about how the chefs carefully crafted the experience
